author: Alex Dhaliwal; June ; News
title: Carbon tax to cost economy $12 billion this year: report
text: Carbon tax to cost economy $12 billion this year: report Data modelling by Environment and Climate Change Canada estimates per capita costs for the carbon tax at $295 per person. That is set to more than double by 2030. The carbon tax is expected to cost the Canadian economy at least $12 billion this year, according to the Canadian Taxpayers Federation (CTF). “The government’s own data shows the carbon tax costs our economy billions of dollars every year,” [said](https://www.taxpayer.com/newsroom/carbon-tax-costs-canadian-economy-12-billion-this-year) Franco Terrazzano, CTF Federal Director. “Prime Minister Justin Trudeau should immediately make life more affordable and help the economy by scrapping his carbon tax.” Data modelling by Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) [estimates](https://open.canada.ca/data/en/dataset/2293053b-27af-4029-87cc-2e8bf4b5c1cb) per capita costs at $295 per person. The department mapped out costs of the carbon tax from 2018 through 2030. The economic cost is the difference between what GDP would be without the carbon tax minus the projected GDP with the carbon tax, says the CTF. At the end of the decade, the carbon tax will cost the Canadian economy $30 billion, or an [estimated](https://www150.statcan.gc.ca/t1/tbl1/en/cv.action?pid=1710005701) $678 per person based on Statistics Canada population projections. Other government [data](https://data-donnees.az.ec.gc.ca/data/substances/monitor/environment-and-climate-change-canada-carbon-pollution-pricing-data/?lang=en) says Canada’s GDP will fall $25 billion in 2030 due to the carbon tax. Environment Minister Steven Guilbeault says the carbon tax impact data he's releasing today was delayed until just before a Conservative motion to do so because of privacy concerns.— Rebel News (@RebelNewsOnline) Since when did the Trudeau Liberals care about Canadians' privacy? [https://t.co/dh39RL8IFZ] [pic.twitter.com/BeUJiftnJ7] [June 13, 2024] Ontario will be on the hook for $4.1 billion this year, followed by Quebec ($3.2 billion), Alberta ($1.8 billion), British Columbia ($1.7 billion), and Saskatchewan ($476 million). Only the Northwest Territories is expected to benefit from the tax to the tune of $15 million. “The carbon tax costs Canadians big time for gas, home heating bills and everything else,” Terrazzano said. “And the carbon tax is a huge drag on the Canadian economy that we just can’t afford.” Parliamentary Budget Officer Yves Giroux, who reviewed government data on the carbon tax, confirmed a gag order had been placed on all information from his office. “The government has economic analysis on the impact of the carbon tax itself and the [output-based pricing system],” he [testified](https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/carbon-tax-will-impact-gdp-by-25-billion-in-2030-internal-data-released-by-liberals-shows) before the finance committee. “We’ve been told explicitly not to disclose and reference it,” Giroux said. The federal government has spent about $200 million administering the carbon tax in Canada, according to separate [records](https://www.taxpayer.com/newsroom/carbon-tax-costs-taxpayers-200-million-to-administer?gad_source=1&gclid=CjwKCAjwjqWzBhAqEiwAQmtgT9CXk0GmJH1G0SX6Ji4dszgx4yErI-c0zg8tPsejCZ9tuXJuVk21nBoCwEsQAvD_BwE) obtained by the CTF. A Department of Environment manager admitted Tuesday that the carbon tax has no impact in reducing most greenhouse gas emissions.— Rebel News Canada (@RebelNews_CA) READ MORE: [https://t.co/XgcMtWAG5Z] [pic.twitter.com/X3rDiaxquV] [May 23, 2024] The environment department has been faulted time again for not explaining the impact of carbon taxes and other measures. Associate Deputy Environment Minister, Lawrence Hanson, said the carbon tax only reduced emissions by 1%. Minister Steven Guilbeault [pledged](https://www.rebelnews.com/environment_canada_admits_carbon_tax_has_minimal_impact_on_reducing_emissions) to do better. But Terrazzano says Canadians have had enough. “Trudeau should stop wasting money, stop punishing Canadians and scrap the carbon tax,” he said. A 2023 [report](https://www.oag-bvg.gc.ca/internet/docs/parl_cesd_202304_05_e.pdf), Emission Reductions Through Greenhouse Gas Regulations, depicted federal climate programs as ‘guesswork’. “The federal government does not know whether it is using the right tools to reduce emissions,” wrote Environment Commissioner Jerry DeMarco. “Solutions exist,” he said, but they are being implemented “much too slowly.” Environment Minister Steven Guilbeault says the Trudeau Liberals will keep pushing the carbon tax, even as fed-up Canadians backed the anti-carbon tax Conservative in Toronto-St. Paul's byelection, a riding the Liberals have held for 30 years.— Rebel News (@RebelNewsOnline) [https://t.co/RX6yeUq6Di] [pic.twitter.com/Wi63YxwsCZ] [June 26, 2024] The National Inventory Report released on May 2 [confirmed](https://publications.gc.ca/collections/collection_2024/eccc/En81-4-2022-1-eng.pdf) emissions in 2022, the most recent available data, increased 9.3 million tonnes year over year to 708 million tonnes. Emissions last declined in 2020 due to pandemic lockdowns. Statistics Canada and Simon Fraser University's Canadian Energy and Emissions Data Centre data show Canada produced 738 megatonnes of carbon emissions in 2020. National Inventory figures showed only Alberta and Saskatchewan had emission declines year over year. Both provinces have opposed the carbon tax as costly and ineffective. Commissioner DeMarco [told](https://www.rebelnews.com/trudeau_liberals_have_never_met_an_emissions_target) the Senate energy committee last year that Canada’s emissions are “up 14 percent since 1990.” “Canada is the only G7 country that has not achieved any emission reduction since 1990,” he said. “That needs to change now.” The carbon tax is currently worth 12¢ per litre of propane, 15¢ per cubic metre of natural gas, 18¢ per litre of gasoline, 20¢ per litre of aviation fuel and 25¢ per litre of heating oil. A 23% increase is due next April 1. Don't Get Censored Big Tech is censoring us. Sign up so we can always stay in touch. Don't Get Censored Big Tech is censoring us. Sign up so we can always stay in touch.

author: globo.com
title: Chuvas em São Leopoldo: enchentes na cidade gaúcha fazem até o prefeito perder o lar
text:
Chuvas no Rio Grande do Sul: Acompanhe a cobertura sobre os estragos causados pelos temporais Chuvas no RS: Número de desalojados no estado dobra; 327 mil pessoas estão fora de casa — Hoje, quando falo disso, não falo como alguém que viu, e sim como alguém que está sentindo na pele a dor — diz. — O reflexo disso tudo, além de social, tem um peso muito poderoso no emocional. Uma tragédia como essa é difícil de recuperar. Estamos com psicólogos para conversar com as pessoas, tentando reanimá-las para que haja uma situação melhor. As pessoas ficam doentes. Eu estou nessa mesma situação.
Além das casas, a infraestrutura municipal teve perdas que vão demandar uma ampla reconstrução.
— Perdi 18 escolas, tudo debaixo d'água, 16 postos de saúde também. As ruas da cidade vão sair dessa enchente deficitárias e com muitos problemas de mobilidade urbana — aponta Vanazzi. — Temos dois diques que foram destruídos. Só para a recuperação deles e das bombas de água vou precisar de R$ 30, 40 milhões para fazer voltar a ter uma certa funcionalidade.
O prefeito ainda não consegue dimensionar o total de dinheiro necessário para a cidade. Correligionário do presidente Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, ele defende que o governo priorize agora a ajuda emergencial e, depois de um plano de trabalho mais detalhado, ajude a financiar a reconstrução dos municípios.
— Estamos numa situação muito difícil. Essa tragédia a que foi submetido o estado e nossa cidade é a maior de toda a nossa história. São cerca de 180 mil desabrigados e mais de 13 mil em albergues, praticamente dois terços da população do município — diz.
Mais recente Próxima Chuvas extremas no sul do país terão aumento de 60% em 30 anos, aponta Inpe

author: finanzen.net Redaktion
title: Novartis verfehlt mit Schuppenflechtemittel Cosentyx Ziele in wichtiger Studie | finanzen.net
text:
Home Aktien Novartis Aktie News zu Novartis Novartis verfehlt mit Schuppenflechtemittel Cosentyx Ziele in wichtiger Studie Novartis verfehlt mit Schuppenflechtemittel Cosentyx Ziele in wichtiger Studie 03.07.25 07:59 Uhr Werbung Werte in diesem Artikel Aktien Novartis AG 98,03 CHF -0,40 CHF -0,41% Charts | News | Analysen Aktie kaufen
BASEL (dpa-AFX) - Der Pharmakonzern Novartis hat mit dem Schuppenflechtemittel Cosentyx in der Phase-III-Studie GCAptAIN die gesetzten Ziele nicht erreicht. Im Rahmen dieser Studie wird Cosentyx in Kombination mit der Verwendung von Steroiddosen zur Behandlung von erwachsenen Personen mit neu diagnostizierter oder schubförmiger Riesenzellarteriitis (GCA) geprüft. Die Cosentyx-Behandlung habe bei den Patienten bis Woche 52 verglichen mit der Einnahme von Placebo keine signifikante Verbesserung hinsichtlich eines nachhaltigen Nachlassens des Leidens gezeigt, teilte der Konzern am Donnerstag mit. Somit habe das Mittel bei den gesetzten sekundären Endpunkten keine statistische Überlegenheit gezeigt. Die Riesenzellarteriitis ist eine entzündlich-rheumatische Erkrankung, bei der es zu einer Gefäßentzündung kommt. Werbung Werbung
Derweil hat Cosentyx laut der Mitteilung verglichen mit einem Placebo bei kumulativen Steroiddosen bezüglich steroidbedingter Toxizität beziehungsweise möglicher Nebenwirkungen statistisch besser abgeschnitten. Und auch das Sicherheitsprofil früherer Untersuchungen sei bestätigt worden, hieß es weiter.
"Auch wenn in der Phase-III-Studie die in der Phase II beobachteten positiven Ergebnisse nicht wiederholt werden konnten, sind wir weiterhin bestrebt, den wissenschaftlichen Fortschritt der Behandlung voranzutreiben und das Verständnis für immunvermittelte Krankheiten zu vertiefen", wird Shreeram Aradhye, Leiter Development und Chief Medical Officer bei Novartis, in der Mitteilung zitiert./mk/hr/AWP/stk
Ausgewählte Hebelprodukte auf Novartis Mit Knock-outs können spekulative Anleger überproportional an Kursbewegungen partizipieren. Wählen Sie einfach den gewünschten Hebel und wir zeigen Ihnen passende Open-End Produkte auf Novartis
Der Hebel muss zwischen 2 und 20 liegen

author: CCS Staff
title: Former Saints linebacker Willie Gay Jr. signs with Dolphins
text:
Former Saints linebacker Willie Gay Jr. signs with Dolphins
Former New Orleans Saints linebacker Willie Gay Jr. is heading to South Florida, signing a one-year deal with the Miami Dolphins after spending the 2024 season in New Orleans. The move for the former Mississippi State standout comes as the Saints continue to reshape their defense with a new coaching staff.
Gay, who signed with the Saints last offseason after four years with the Kansas City Chiefs, played in 15 games for New Orleans in 2024, starting eight. He finished the season with 28 tackles, two sacks, three pass breakups, and a forced fumble. However, a significant hand injury in Week 4 required surgery and forced him to play with a protective club for part of the season.
The Saints signed Gay in hopes of adding veteran leadership and championship experience to their linebacker group. He had won two Super Bowls with the Chiefs, becoming an asset due to his speed and versatility.
New Orleans will have a new defensive scheme with more 3-4 looks in 2025 under defensive coordinator Brandon Staley. With veterans like Demario Davis and Pete Werner still leading the unit, the team will likely look to the draft or free agency to add depth, speed and pass rush skills at linebacker.
-

author: @andaluciainf
title: Este 29 de febrero, una ocasión ideal para visibilizar las enfermedades raras | Andalucía Información. Todas las noticias de Almería
text: Este 29 de febrero se celebra el Día Mundial de las Enfermedades Raras. Un día que no es común en el calendario y que por eso fue elegido para visibilizar las enfermedades poco frecuentes. En España hay más de 3 millones de personas que sufren alguna de estas patologías, que en el 95% de los casos son discapacitantes, degenerativas y sin tratamiento. Además, la falta de investigación y la baja incidencia hace que el diagnóstico tarde más de cuatro años, incluso a veces ni si quiera se llegua al mismo. Jaén cuenta con una asociación de referencia que desde hace varios lucha por la visibilización de las enfermedades raras y de los pacientes. Bajo el nombre de 'Más Visibles', esta entidad lucha por mejorar la atención a los enfermos, a las familias, el avance en la investigación, la obtención de diagnósticos y la calidad de vida de estas personas. Para ello, este 2024 llevará a cabo diferentes campañas para que las EERR sean conocidas ya que pueden aparecer en cualquier momento de la vida. En esta jornada, la asociación jiennense 'Más Visibles' ha participado en Madrid en una acto conmemorativo del Día Mundial de las EERR, en el que se ha mostrado la situación en España, la visión asistencial, legislativa y el apoyo de diversos sectores en la lucha para avanzar ante las enfermedades poco frecuentes. El jienense Pedro Lendínez, presidente de 'Más Visibles', ha sido el encargado de clausurar una jornada en la que enfermos y familias piden a la sociedad y a las administraciones más conciencia, investigación e integración ante enfermedades que podría padecer cualquiera. Para conseguirlo, esta asociación, que nace en Jaén, [está rodando la película documental ‘La vida en una gota’.](https://vivajaen.es/provincia-de-jaen/1516207/una-pelicula-documental-con-sello-jiennense-para-prevenir-enfermedades-raras/) En ella Judit, una joven que padece una enfermedad rara, que no fue diagnosticada a tiempo, recorre diferentes centros de referencia para mostrar la importancia de la prueba del talón, una prueba que puede cribar ciertas patologías y evitar la aparición de esas enfermedades detectadas. La joven ha estado estos días en un centro escolar de Jabalquinto con el objetivo de concienciar y sensibilizar sobre este asunto. La próxima cita con Más Visibles será en las III Jornadas sobre EERR el próximo 5 y 6 de abril. Envía tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)

author: Cody Nickel
title: Late weekend front ushers in cold air for the first full week of the new year
text:
WRBL Columbus Late weekend front ushers in cold air for the first full week of the new year Cody Nickel Fri, January 3, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC 1 min read
Late weekend front ushers in cold air for the first full week of the new year COLUMBUS, Ga. (WRBL) — Good Friday Morning! A few passing clouds to the north this morning as temperatures continue to fall towards freezing and into the upper 20s across the area. Widespread frost will be likely on the ground and especially on elevated surfaces.
For today as we close out the first Friday of the new year we will see plenty of sunny skies with winds picking up this afternoon as the frontal system pushes through. Afternoon highs will reach the upper 50s today.
Saturday starts off cold again with readings likely sub-freezing for everyone and cooler afternoon temperatures in the low 50s and a few areas to the north likely staying in the upper 40s.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Tracking our next system, it arrives Sunday with a few light showers possible throughout the late afternoon and early evening while the bulk of the showers come in overnight and into Monday morning. This system passes through with gradual clearing Monday and ushering in more cold air.
Next week will be very cold with lows in the 20s and highs in the 40s, which leads to (I know you’ve seen it on social media) the potential for wintry precipitation. As of right now, too early to be specific and everything has to come together in order for it to happen.

author: La pluma de la Fortuna
title: Lluvia de premios en Canarias
text: Lluvia de premios en Canarias Un segundo premio de la Bonoloto toca en Tenerife Lluvia de premios este jueves en [Canarias](https://www.eldia.es/canarias/). Todos los principales sorteos que se celebran este 14 de marzo se han dejado notar en las Islas, en especial la Bonoloto. Según ha informado [ Loterías y Apuestas del Estado](https://www.loteriasyapuestas.es/es/resultados), en la isla de [Tenerife](https://www.eldia.es/tenerife/) ha tocado un segundo premio de este sorteo (5 aciertos + C), más concretamente en la gasolinera El Bohío, en la autopista del Norte. El afortunado recibirá 41.771 euros. Sin embargo, el mayor afortunado de las Islas no obtendrá esta cantidad, sino casi 2,8 millones de euros, al obtener un premio de la Bonoloto de primera categoría (6 aciertos). En este caso, la combinación ganadora cayó en Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. La combinación ganadora del sorteo de la Bonoloto de este jueves es 07 12 18 32 46 47, complementario el 11 y [reintegro](https://www.elperiodico.com/es/loteria-navidad/premios/) el 9. Pero la provincia de Las Palmas ha llevado su idilio con la suerte más allá, ya que también ha tocado un segundo premio de la Primitiva, premiado con 24.770 euros, y dos segundos de la Lotería Nacional, premiados con 6.000 euros al número. - Combinación ganadora La Primitiva: 01 07 10 18 41 43 - C 13 - R 2 - Primer premio Lotería Nacional: 67455 - Segundo premio Lotería Nacional: 29648 ¿Cómo se juega a la Bonoloto? El Sorteo de la Bonoloto se celebra todos los días de la semana. El boleto está formado por 8 columnas, cada una de las cuales con número que van desde el 1 al 49. En cada sorteo se extraen 6 bolas del bombo principal y una bola más de un segundo bombo que corresponde al reintegro. La Bonoloto permite jugar mediante apuesta simple o múltiple. En el primer caso, cada apostante deberá rellenar tantas columnas como apuestas quiera realizar. En cada una de ellas rellenará 6 números. En el caso de la apuesta múltiple, solo se marcan número de una columna y en función del número de apuestas que se quiera jugar, se seleccionará una cantidad de números diferente entre una de las siguientes posibles: - Si marcas la casilla de 44 apuestas, deberás seleccionar 5 números en el primer bloque. El conjunto formado por esos cinco números elegidos juega con cada uno de los restantes números del bloque, formándose así 44 conjuntos de seis pronósticos, es decir, 44 apuestas - Si marcas la casilla de 7 apuestas, deberás seleccionar 7 números en el primer bloque - Si marcas la casilla de 28 apuestas, deberás seleccionar 8 números en el primer bloque - Si marcas la casilla de 84 apuestas, deberás seleccionar 9 números en el primer bloque - Si marcas la casilla de 210 apuestas, deberás seleccionar 10 números en el primer bloque - Si marcas la casilla de 462 apuestas, deberás seleccionar 11 números en el primer bloque ¿Cuánto cuesta jugar? El importe de cada apuesta es de 0,50 euros. El importe mínimo del boleto completo es 1 euro, por tanto: Si tu boleto participa en un único sorteo, debe incluir al menos 2 apuestas (50 céntimos x 2 apuestas x 1 sorteo = 1 euro). Si tu boleto participa en dos o más sorteos (sorteo semanal), puede incluir desde 1 única apuesta (50 céntimos x 1 apuesta x 2 sorteos = 1 euro) Premios de la Bonoloto En Bonoloto se destina el 55% de la recaudación a premios, distribuyéndose entre las siguientes categorías de premios: 1ª Categoría: si se aciertan los 6 números de la combinación ganadora. 2ª Categoría: si se aciertan 5 números de la combinación ganadora más la extracción correspondiente al número complementario* 3ª Categoría: si se aciertan 5 números de la combinación ganadora 4ª Categoría: si se aciertan 4 números de la combinación ganadora 5ª Categoría: si se aciertan 3 números de la combinación ganadora Reintegro: si el número destinado a este premio coincide con el de tu boleto y vendrá referido al importe total de apuestas en las que has participado. Sorteo Semanal: el reintegro para la modalidad de abono o sorteo semanal se sorteará cada día, asignándose el premio correspondiente al valor de la apuesta diaria. Sorteo Diario: el reintegro para la modalidad de participación diaria vendrá determinado por el dígito ganador del sorteo del día de participación. author: Michael Walter
title: Johnson & Johnson MedTech gains FDA approval for Varipulse PFA system
text:
Johnson & Johnson MedTech gains FDA approval for Varipulse PFA system
Johnson & Johnson MedTech has received U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approval for its Varipulse pulsed field ablation (PFA) system designed to treat paroxysmal atrial fibrillation (AFib). The system previously gained European CE mark approval in February.
The FDA’s decision was based largely on data from admIRE clinical trial, which included 277 patients who underwent treatment with the Varipulse system throughout the United States. The study linked PFA with Varipulse to acute procedural success in 100% of patients and a primary effectiveness success rate of 75%. Adverse events were seen in just 2.9% of patients, and 43% of patients were able to go home on the same day they were treated.
The Varipulse Platform is now the fourth PFA offering to gain FDA approval, following Medtronic’s PulseSelect and Affera systems and Boston Scientific’s Farapulse system. It includes the Varipulse catheter, which was designed with mapping integration in mind, the Trupulse generator for powering all PFA pulse sequences and the Carto 3 System for 3D navigation and cardiac mapping.
“We have learned that with PFA technology, mapping integration is critically important for electrophysiologists to ‘see’ inside the heart and deliver pulsed field energy with accuracy,” Luigi Di Biase, MD, PhD, system director of electrophysiology with the Montefiore Health System and a professor of cardiology with the Albert Einstein College of Medicine at Montefiore Hospital,” said in a statement. “With today’s approval, electrophysiologists will have the ability to use an integrated mapping system—Carto—for PFA procedures, enabling a singular, versatile workflow, that could reduce procedure time, potentially driving positive results for patients.”
“With this approval, we are excited to bring the Varipulse Platform to electrophysiologists and patients in the U.S., where AFib impacts nearly eight million people,” added Jasmina Brooks, president of electrophysiology for Johnson & Johnson MedTech and former president of Biosense Webster. “As the only PFA platform uniquely designed for seamless integration with the Carto 3 System, we are confident that this eagerly awaited platform will be a valuable tool for physicians in performing safe, effective and efficient AFib procedures with an intuitive and reproducible workflow, and minimal-to-no fluoroscopy.”
The Varipulse Platform was designed and developed when the company was still known as Biosense Webster, a part of Johnson & Johnson MedTech. Back in September, however, Johnson & Johnson announced that Biosense Webster and some of its other healthcare technology companies would all now be going by the name Johnson & Johnson MedTech.
“By bringing our medtech businesses together under the Johnson & Johnson name, the scale of our impact in healthcare will be even more apparent, unlocking new opportunities for us to strengthen our competitiveness,” Tim Schmid, Johnson & Johnson executive vice president and worldwide chairman of medtech, said at the time.

author: Escrito por Meon
title: Atleta de Jacareí conquista título na Copa Brasil de Tênis de Mesa
text:
A atleta Maria Fernandes, de Jacareí, fez história ao vencer a atual número 1 do ranking nacional de Tênis de Mesa e conquistar o título da Copa Brasil Maringá, realizada no último fim de semana no Paraná. Maria se destacou na categoria 'Absoluto A', onde derrotou Valesca, uma das maiores referências do esporte no Brasil. Além disso, ela também se consagrou campeã na categoria 'Sub 21', somando duas medalhas de ouro para sua equipe.
+ Receba as notícias do dia - Clique AQUI para seguir o Canal do Meon no WhatsApp
O técnico Waldemir Júnior não escondeu a felicidade com o resultado e ressaltou o feito extraordinário. "Vencer a Valesca não é tarefa fácil, ela está em excelente forma. A Maria jogou com um nível de desempenho muito alto, principalmente no saque e na recepção, o que foi essencial para conquistar esse título", afirmou.
A Copa Brasil Maringá, que abriu o calendário nacional de Tênis de Mesa, também contou com boas performances de outros atletas de Jacareí. Daniel Izumi, estreante de 14 anos, foi vice-campeão na categoria 'Absoluto F', conquistando a medalha de prata após enfrentar atletas adultos em nove partidas desafiadoras. A equipe também contou com o desempenho de Jonas Izumi, Clara Santos e Miguel Izumi, que fizeram apresentações consistentes.
O apoio da Prefeitura Municipal de Jacareí, através da Secretaria de Esportes e Recreação, foi fundamental para o sucesso da equipe, que segue com o objetivo de representar a cidade com excelência. O secretário de Esportes e Recreação, Carlos Eduardo Dudi, parabenizou a equipe pelos resultados. "A vitória da Maria Fernandes é um reflexo do trabalho sério e dedicado da nossa equipe. A Prefeitura continuará investindo no desenvolvimento dos nossos atletas e no fortalecimento do esporte em Jacareí", afirmou.
+ Receba as principais notícias do dia - Clique AQUI
Com o apoio de parceiros como a Academia SportMania, Instituto Treinavision e outros, Maria Fernandes segue em ascensão. O próximo compromisso da equipe será a abertura do Campeonato Paulista, que acontecerá no Sesi de Jacareí, nos dias 22 e 23 de março.
Os comentários e avaliações são de responsabilidade exclusiva de seus autores e não representam a opinião do site.
